titles.title: Jobs Momentum Act of 2010
To reduce the employer portion of payroll taxes in the case of employers who expand payroll in 2010 and 2011.
Jobs Momentum Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Jobs Momentum Act of 2010 - Allows a reduction in 2010 and 2011 of an employer's payroll taxes by a specified percentage of the amount by which such employer increases aggregate payroll over the preceding calendar year.
